summary: The client inquired about pairing wireframes with user stories for backend functionality, and Mike proposed an adjusted Sprint 1 plan including STYLE-001 (UI Style Guide), US-008 (Supabase Backend Integration), and US-006 (Basic Authentication and Role-Based Access) to enable a testable login flow.

backlog_deltas.title: UI Style Guide added to Sprint 1 for consistency
Supabase Backend Integration added to Sprint 1 as foundational dependency
Basic Authentication and Role-Based Access added to Sprint 1, including WF-006 wireframe
